name: Iyyara & Halalfoodhunt
shortDes: Iyyara & Halalfoodhunt is an app from Singapore that verifies halal food options (eateries, online businesses, food vendors, etc.) before publishing them.
descriptions: Develop APIs for a new module using Express.js and Prisma, ensuring data integrity with thorough testing.
Configure CI/CD pipeline to deploy product to staging and production environments with Docker.
Implement scheduled database backup using a Shell Script service within a Docker container.

name: Tico E-commerce
shortDes: Tico E-commerce is a set of commerce tools and modules that can be used to build unique commerce experiences.
descriptions: Discuss with the team, analyze the feature, and review other open-source projects.
Develop core features of an e-commerce module, including Orders, Products, and Payments.
Setup Nginx as an API Gateway and Load Balancer.
Integrate Payment (VNPay, Momo, Stripe) and Shipping (GHTK, GHN) services into the system.

name: Early Parrot
shortDes: EarlyParrot is a SaaS referral marketing platform from Malta that includes marketing automation tools, tracking and analytics features.
descriptions: Build the UI using AngularJS and Bootstrap to provide a smooth experience.
Develop features to support clients in tracking their referral numbers.
Develop data synchronization features and ensure the consistency of user data from various SaaS providers.
Resolve race conditions in existing features and during large data synchronization.

name: Mark Platform
shortDes: Mark Platform is a platform that connects homeowners with top-rated interior designers in Singapore.
descriptions: Create middleware to dynamically authorize user roles.
Use FastAPI to develop APIs and create automated tests with Pytest.
Integrate Stripe Payments API to create a subscription system.
Configure CI/CD pipeline for automatic deployment using Docker, and Nginx on a DigitalOcean Droplet.
